meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>illuminate</kanji> some food, then <kanji>bake</kanji> it. To illuminate it, you put on some shiny sauce. Sound familiar, in terms of a type of food? This is <vocabulary>teriyaki</vocabulary>, though I have to warn you it's quite different from the teriyaki you get in the west.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 照る and 焼く. Put them together and you have something delicious.
